descriptions: You can download a trial version of this app to try it for 30 minutes for free.
You won’t be charged anything when this free trial ends. You can’t make in-app purchases or use add-on content during this free trial, but you’ll keep any achievements you earn.

display_long_description:
Punch dinosaurs, battle shotgun-wielding ninjas and dodge devious traps in Action Hero, a blockbuster VR FPS with explosive set pieces and cinematic design.

# Be The Hero In Your Favorite Movie Genres
[media]

Fight your way through six bombastic movies, stepping into the hero’s shoes. Gameplay proceeds in slow motion, only speeding up as the player moves. Lean around bullets with stylish satisfaction, catch weapons in mid-air and take down enormous bosses.
[media]

# Features: 

- Become the action hero in six genre-spanning movies. Pull off an explosive heist, master kung-fu in an epic saga, hunt for treasure in trap-filled ruins and more.
- Each movie mixes up gameplay with challenges, weapons, and setpieces. Dive under boulders, weave through laser grids and topple enormous bosses.
[media]
- Lose yourself in an immersive action experience in cinematic slow motion that lets you nail last-chance shots, deliver bruising punches, and dodge ninja stars just inches from your eyeballs.
- Play the Arcade Mode to transform the cinema experience into an arcadey score fest!
- No forced locomotion, no sudden drops, no artificial camera movement - Action Hero is a perfectly comfortable experience for VR veterans and newcomers alike.
[media]

# Features: 

- Become the action hero in six genre-spanning movies. Pull off an explosive heist, master kung-fu in an epic saga, hunt for treasure in trap-filled ruins and more.
- Each movie mixes up gameplay with challenges, weapons, and setpieces. Dive under boulders, weave through laser grids and topple enormous bosses.
